argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | grpdivf.1 | |- X = ran G |
| 2 |  | grpdivf.3 | |- D = ( /g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | grpdivid.3 | |- U = ( GId ` G ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( inv ` G ) = ( inv ` G ) |
| 5 | 1, 4, 2 | #P_grpodivval | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ A e. X ) -> ( A D A ) = ( A G ( ( inv ` G ) ` A ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_3anidm23 | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( A D A ) = ( A G ( ( inv ` G ) ` A ) ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 3, 4 | #P_grporinv | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( A G ( ( inv ` G ) ` A ) ) = U ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( A D A ) = U ) |
